BuildingRequests.Description: A BuildingRequests object is a container for a Player's desired GroupOfChanges involving builds and demolitions. BuildingRequests are kept separate from other changes a Player wishes to make to the GameState so that the HousingResolver can settle building conflicts before applying them.

_house_builds.Description: The GroupOfChanges containing a Player's requests for house builds

_hotel_builds.Description: The GroupOfChanges containing a Player's requests for hotel builds

_house_demolitions.Description: The GroupOfChanges containing a Player's requests for house demolitions

_hotel_demolitions.Description: The GroupOfChanges containing a Player's requests for hotel demolitions

_houses_built.Description: The total number of houses built in these BuildingRequests

_hotels_built.Description: The total number of hotels built in these BuildingRequests

_houses_demolished.Description: The total number of houses demolished in these BuildingRequests

_hotels_demolished.Description: The total number of hotels demolished in these BuildingRequests
